alert.note: Alert for Gila River Valley; Kofa; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 8:22PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern La Paz and north central Yuma Counties through 900 PM MST... At 822 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Yuma Proving Ground, or 19 miles northeast of Martinez Lake, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yuma Proving Ground. This includes AZ Route 95 between mile markers 56 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
